explanation: [0-0] The area around the cabin door of an airplane. A man in a gray suit is standing at the door facing right, his right foot extended to the right, and his right hand gripping the side of the door. Above the door is a red bilingual exit sign. On the ceiling of the cabin, there is a camera and a square light fixture. A person is standing outside the door, and vehicles and buildings on the tarmac can be seen in the distance.

[0-4] Then the man in the gray suit puts his right hand on the door, pulls it closed with both hands, and looks down to the right. A man wearing a gray vest and a red tie appears on the left. The person in the fluorescent green clothes outside the cabin turns to the left and walks forward.

[0-4] Then the man in the gray suit puts his right hand on the door, pulls it closed with both hands, and looks down to the right. A man wearing a gray vest and a red tie appears on the left. The person in the fluorescent green clothes outside the cabin turns to the left and walks forward.

[0-4] Then the man in the gray suit puts his right hand on the door, pulls it closed with both hands, and looks down to the right. A man wearing a gray vest and a red tie appears on the left. The person in the fluorescent green clothes outside the cabin turns to the left and walks forward.

[0-4] Then the man in the gray suit puts his right hand on the door, pulls it closed with both hands, and looks down to the right. A man wearing a gray vest and a red tie appears on the left. The person in the fluorescent green clothes outside the cabin turns to the left and walks forward.

[4-8] Subsequently, the man in the gray vest on the left speaks to the man in the gray suit with his head down, then disappears to the left of the frame. The man in the gray suit turns to the right, smiles, talks and walks forward, then turns to the left, smiles and picks up the phone from the wall, looks down at the phone in his hand with a smile.
